short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OpenWAX(Open Web Accessibility eXtension) is a tool that can help diagnose and fix the accessibility problem.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OpenWAX(Open Web Accessibility eXtension) is a tool that can help diagnose and fix the accessibility problem. OpenWAX can diagnose following accessibility problems. * Text Alternatives of , , CSS Background * Use of color * Contrast * Data Table * Shortcut * Language of page * Keyboard focus * Page title * Frame title * Heading elements * Skip navigation * Link text * Label * Markup validation error for a11y
long.ko: N-WAX(NHN Web Accessibility eXtension) is a tool that can help diagnose and fix the accessibility problem. N-WAX can diagnose following accessibility problems. * Text Alternatives of , , CSS Background * Use of color * Contrast * Data Table * Shortcut * Language of page * Keyboard focus * Page title * Frame title * Heading elements * Skip navigation * Link text * Label * Markup validation error for a11y
